scripts.docker:run: docker rm -f autoheal || npm run docker:build && docker run --name=autoheal --rm -e DEBUG='docker-autoheal:*' -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock mcasimir/docker-autoheal
scripts.docker:tag: npm run docker:build && docker tag mcasimir/docker-autoheal mcasimir/docker-autoheal:$npm_package_version
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:tag && docker push mcasimir/docker-autoheal
